pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Michaëlle Jean, Secretary General of La Francophonie | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with the Secretary General of the Organisation internationale de la Francophonie, the Right Honourable Michaëlle Jean.

The Secretary General congratulated the Prime Minister on the Government’s feminist international assistance policy, particularly emphasizing the importance of the economic empowerment of women and its positive impact at the community level.

The Prime Minister and the Secretary General will continue to co-operate on issues of common interest, such as strengthening the empowerment of women and girls, international security and the fight against terrorism. They are both pleased about Canada’s active participation in the 8th Games of La Francophonie to be held in Abidjan, Côte d’Ivoire, next month.
